page.title: 16SHOPPING NEEDS IN CAMBORNE
page.content:
{ TYPE OF SHOP PERCENTAGE 1.Clothes. : 25.00% 2.Shoe/Shoe Repairs. : 3.93% 3.Supermarkets. : 22.47% 4.Fruiterers. : 1.96% 5.Cafes/Restaurants. : 8.98% 6.Chemists. : 0.84% 7.Bakers. : 1.68% 8.Butchers. : 1.12% 9.D.I.Y. : 13.76% 10.Jewellers. : 1.68% 11.Wool Shops. : 1.68% 12.Pet Shops. : 1.12% 13.Card Shops. : 1.96% 14.Any Others. : 8.14% 15.Dont know : 5.68%
As part of a local survey people were asked to indicate types of shops most needed in Camborne.There were 356 replies.Age range 16-60+
